title: Paul Kelly and the Messengers
itunes:title: Paul Kelly and the Messengers
description:
In October 1988, Australian singer-songwriter Paul Kelly made his second SNAP appearance with two members of his band, The Messengers, in tow: pianist Peter Bull and drummer Michael Barclay (here reduced to a backing vocal role).

They play a low-key acoustic set featuring numbers from their latest album, “Under the Sun,” and others from his catalog.
itunes:summary:
In October 1988, Australian singer-songwriter Paul Kelly made his second SNAP appearance with two members of his band, The Messengers, in tow: pianist Peter Bull and drummer Michael Barclay (here reduced to a backing vocal role). 
 They play a low-key acoustic set featuring numbers from their latest album, “Under the Sun,” and others from his catalog.
media:description: Australian songwriter Paul Kelly dropped in on SNAP with two of his Messengers in tow for a stately piano/guitar acoustic set promoting their 1988 album, “Under the Sun.”
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW, Tricia Halloran)
itunes:author: KCRW, Tricia Halloran
